name: Epibayes
tagline: Tools for epidemiological modeling w/Bayesian stats
body:
Epibayes
========

This is an experiment in using [Theano](http://deeplearning.net/software/theano/) and [PyMC](https://github.com/pymc-devs/pymc) for the statistical analysis of individual-based models of epidemiological dynamics.

Files in the /hmm directory show a simple implementation of a hidden markov model, using both Theano and pure Numpy.

Files in the /trans directory are the beginning of a spatial transmission model in which transmission occurs between patches connected by a [gravity model](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gravity_model). The trans.mcmc module contains wrappers for using these elements within PyMC and a custom step method for sampling the missing states of a latent patch occupancy model.
